name: rousingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes people feel excited and proud or ready to take action: The candidate spoke rousingly about her vision for the city. The national anthem was rousingly sung by both the players and the crowd.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is a rousingly patriotic film, made at the peak of the leader's popularity and reflecting his widespread support.She was cheered rousingly when she walked onto the stage.Everyone in the pub joined in with a rousingly old-fashioned singalong.
